name: @getdrip/much-select-elm
description: A fancy selector web component written (mostly) in elm.

scripts.watch: parcel --out-dir build/output public/index.html public/dropdown-options.html public/option-api.html public/empty-options.html public/initial-value.html public/fancy-characters.html
scripts.build-site: parcel build --out-dir build/site/public public/index.html public/dropdown-options.html public/option-api.html public/empty-options.html public/initial-value.html public/fancy-characters.html public/404.html

author: Jachin Rupe <jachin.rupe@drip.com>
